column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Entrees were the Steak Tartare
column2: which the person said was the best she's had anywhere in Chicago.  Then one Steak Frites
column3: again winning very high marks.  I had the 10 oz. Filet
column5: which was cooked to perfection for me (rare) and the peppercorn crust was nice
